text:
@piersmorgan It's the obvious thing to do.  Getting control of 'our' borders is a principle objective of Brexit, and coronavirus is a fantastic right wing enabler.

Pity about the money, but it's only public money.  Tax havens will still keep 'their' money under 'their' control after Brexit.
